title.rendered: BUSHWAKKA NEXT GEN LHS EXTREME 270 AWNING ENDO FRAME (PASSENGER SIDE)

content.rendered:
NOW WITH ENDO FRAME

The Extreme 270 has evolved… The Next-Gen Extreme taking on the the form of the True Blue. Sharing the unique swing around double arm design.
giving the Extreme even more strength.

Black Backing Plate, Upgrade Buckles, clip in leg are some of the new upgrades…

The Next-Gen Extreme still comes with 1 built in leg, if you require the full wall kit it would be recommend to get the extra legs as well.

Using a Rhino Platform or any North -South plank running platform? Then you will need to look at our platform bracket options. (Not included as standard)

The Extreme 270 is a new improved awning for vehicles providing quick installation and unparalleled shade area. 

The setting up and packing up is a 1 person job and can be done in only seconds. The bag is big enough so no degree is needed, and the handy velcro strips are in place to keep the awning secure while you zip it close.

The design of the Extreme is focused on the Hinge providing unmatched strength in this category free from poles and ropes. Manufactured from high quality and durable square tube aluminium frame that starts with 2 tubes at the base and running into one.

The Canvas is a 600D Ripstop Canvas with PU water resistant coating and a UV 50+ rating. In the grey colour the canvas has good heat repellent to keep you nice and cool in the shade.

Coming in at a mere 24Kg including L brackets and a satisfying 2.5m long covering 12m2

Please note: a Canopy, Tub Rack or Wagon is preferred for a 270 awning.

Important when installing to have the L bracket close to the hinge for the support 

Pack up Size:

250 L x 18 H x 15 Wide

26kg

Inclusions:

  • Unique Rope Ratchet to secure the awning on the side
  • L Brackets (powder quoted steel, does require rust maintenance)
  • Tie down points to create a gutter to help water run off
  • Black Painted Arms
  • 306 Stainless Steel Nuts and Bolts supplied (Not 316, so rust maintenance is necessary)

Please note due to the size of this item it is pick up only from our store in Coffs Harbour. 

 

To see the full range of Bushwakka adventure gear available at Automax 4X4 click here.

Be sure to follow us on Facebook and Instagram to get your 4WD fix.
